01_data_basics/02_proportion/07_read_histogram_discrete_v2

A standard six-sided die was rolled 500 times, and the results were organized into the histogram shown below.



  1. Evaluate \(\text{prop}[\mathbf{x}<3.5]\).
  2. Evaluate \(\text{prop}[\mathbf{x}>4.5]\).
  3. Evaluate \(\text{prop}[|\mathbf{x}-3|<0.5]\).
  4. Evaluate \(\text{prop}[|\mathbf{x}-4.5|>1]\).
  5. Evaluate half-integer boundary \(b\) such that \(\text{prop}[\mathbf{x}<b] = 0.628\).
  6. Evaluate half-integer boundary \(b\) such that \(\text{prop}[\mathbf{x}>b] = 0.69\).
  7. Evaluate half-integer radius \(r\) such that \(\text{prop}[|\mathbf{x}-3|<r] = 0.162\).
  8. Evaluate integer radius \(r\) such that \(\text{prop}[|\mathbf{x}-2.5|>r] = 0.688\).
